content: Just as useless as the real police. Blue lives don't exist and cops are useless racists used by the rich, anybody who enjoys this game is a terrible person.
This is more movie than a game. It has forgotten what it actually is.

I think the concept and and idea is in the right place to have a really awesome game, however this game is very lacking and limited. I think they should have kept it like the first one, and added on. You can have a bit of fun with this game, but I find it leaves you wanting more.
Great game... more improved than the 1st one... my only problem is that it was too short, I still wanted more lol... but nice game worth downloading...
Font so small it makes the game completely unplayable.
The opening cutscreen/dialog is so, so long. Gave up as I prefer the game mechanics over the story. It would be brilliant if there was a sandbox mode.

It's an amazing game, but sometimes the combat gets pretty difficult and the suspects can swark you. Not being able to have shifts like the first game got me at first. It took me a while to realize what I was doing wrong and I overcame that. But shifts would be nice.
Amazing game
F***ING amazing, love the art style, the story, the pace, awesome work really never been so immersed in a game! Hope there is a third!
Just need sandbox mode or custom day without story or a training mode for practice.
This is a fantastic game!! So well done! And works wonders on Android! My only complaint, and it's a tiny one compared to how awesome the game is, is that it eats battery life! But 5/5 all the way!

It takes all the good bits from the first and adds more depth and rpg elements. The cut scenes are far too long, but I have still spent many hours playing. *However* the learning curve is so so steep and at one point becomes ridiculous from one decision you make, then you have to go back to start. After hours and hours. No good am afraid
Very epic story Unique graphics Great Police Sim
That was more of a movie than a game...

Unplayable. Literally. For me anyway. How ANYONE can get through the rambling incoherent tripe dialogue that goes on and on and on and on at the start. I've never experienced anything like it and I've been gaming since 92. I skipped a scene of jovial banter (it was that or tear my eyes out) and some guy ended up dead. I got this game on sale and feel ripped off. Gameplay and visuals are fine. Comic book xcom, nothing special.

The game is shorter than the 1st one but makes up for it in the story. Basically like the 1st game but better. Yes, the cutscenes are long but the story is good and you can actually follow it this time. The turn based combat is a good start kind of janky sometimes and overly difficult at other times. Though overall quite the peefect sequel especially for the series fans.
Give it time, its a decent game. Yes the narrative sections can be too long, and some parts are way too difficult compared to the rest of the game, but still worth it.

Really fun and entertaining game that gets more in depth as it progresses. TITP2 changes just enough over time that in never becomes stale. And it's fun to pretend to be a police officer while still being able to do corrupt things and not get stuck in the "everyday hero" archetype. The first one is good too but the added mechanics and assault nose just makes this one of the rare sequels to outshine it's predecessor. 10 stars if I could

Far too many cutscenes, and the app is unstable. It started off OK, but then it started randomly crashing when entering an interrogation or a tactical battle. After replaying the same day 8 times to have it crash at the end of the day, I am finally giving up. If the app had worked I would have given it 3 stars. I think more work needed to go into gameplay, and I think if you are going to focus so much on story it should include more choices to keep people engaged.

I was so hyped for this game when I heard about it, but the game crashes before I can do anything. I've seen YouTube playthoughs of this game and I wanted to play it for myself, but it seems like either the game has a bug or my tablet is not good enough to support it.

Honestly , don't bother! Just download the 1st game instead. The improvements they've made are wasted by cut scene after cut scene. Awfull! Should put in a sandbox mode! Also needing a certain amount ic professionalism for missions is silly. Ever heard of rookie cops???? Its s shame ,? I love the 1st game ,? But this needs massive revamping and massive rethinking !
Way to short
Perfect...
Its good
WAY too much cutscenes for the amount of actual gameplay. Cutscenes do not heavily change the gameplay making them feel tiring. Disappointed on this sequel.

Absolutely insane amount of cutscenes. I have been 2 days now trying to sit and play this, but have played about a total of about 2-5 mins. Cut scenes that aren't needed, the majority of lines in the cutscenes are unnecessary and take forever to get through. Much more of a movie, don't expect to play much. Waste of money if you expect anything along the lines of the first.

Its great,fun,strategic and all that But the problem is how the game crashes at certain times what i mean is the game crashes by going to black screen and makes me restart the whole day again that's so annoying. Besides that everything else is great.
BORING! Too much un-interactive story telling not enough game play
Why cant i spend my caps anymore? I need more cops but i cant buy amymore

EDIT: Deleted. This is supposed to be a game but with the cut scenes it plays like the most boring movie ever. Everything that people have said about the cut scenes is right. There are too many of them, and they are so slow to play out. They pause while someone is walking along which doesn't add suspense or develop the story, it is just dull. I've been playing for about 30 mins and have only done one mission so far. I'll give it another 10 mins or so and if it doesn't perk up I'm uninstalling.
Endless cut scenes. Even with the skip option you spend 15 mins just skipping things until you can actually do something. Then you get to your first mission and.... More cut scenes.

Absolutely love the first installment and I like the new tactical features BUT: the cutscenes in this episode are painfully boring and long, so much so that I stopped playing. Truly is a shame they ruined the game with them.
Tiny! Must be played on a tablet or phablet. Impossible to play on a phone.

One of the deeoest most engrossing ganes on the market at the minute. Although the plot is less well grounded than the first, casting off sone of the heavy overtones and offering more variety and pkayer chouce has given this game more character and vitality than its predecessor.

Great game ruined by awful cutscenes. When you actually get to play the game, it's like the first one but better. I'm a fan of the tactical missions they put you in but their a little clunky and require a few redos to even understand them. The new functions they added make the game so much more funand complex. You are required to use alot more strategy than in the first game. Would love to rate it higher but I cant overstate how painful the cutscenes are.
Painfully boring cut scenes. Can only assume that they're there to stop you from trying the game out while you still have time to get a refund
The dialogue is worse than oblivion
Potential to be fantastic ruined by the RTS mini game. An option to turn that off, as its hard and boring, and I will increase to 5, as I think it would be worth it then.

Love the game so far but I can't progress past the necktie base. The game crashes before the assault every time. I also think that a more developed customisation system for your officers is needed, so you can change type of firearm or ammo etc. I know that the developers probably won't change the mobile version too much though.

The gameplay seems somewhat improved over the first one. They've made some smart tweaks to the management gameplay and added a whole XCOM-style tactical layer that seems alright. The story is maybe even more in-your-face than the first game though, especially initially. There are a LOT of cutscenes, and some dialogues probably did not need to be as long as they are. But I think what's actually pretty rotten about this game is the bait and switch they pull on you with the protagonist. The woman you see on the cover? You're not playing as her.
Great game there is a learning curve

Constantly stuck in a cycle of guys not showing up or coming in drunk or randomly deciding they dont want to be cops. Then I have 3 days of no tabs and have to start over. It's so easy to fail when you make your guys so high maintenance. Regret paying for this but it's a good game when it actually works. And the music is horrible. And if you send your guys on those special missions for some reason they always decide they no longer want to be cops so I decided I'm not sending anyone ever.
Doesn't work when I open the game

I was playing the game for 10 mins and still didn't get to actually play it. It was all cut scenes, and even though I skipped all of them they just kept coming. So I deleted it cause I already hate games that have long tutorials and this is just ridiculous. I cant imagine how many more cut scenes are back to back in this game.
Good Rerun On This Game On Rerun I Mean You Made This Is The Police The 2016 Game You Made That Game Really Good And This Game Also Too
Awesome gameplay, reminds one of steel tactics for the pc. But the storyline is really amateurish and confusing.

The gameplay is good but for the love of God make a way for people who don't care about the story (it drudges on) to skip it faster or something. There's 30 freaking cutscenes you have to go through in the begining before you can get to playing the game and even with holding to skip all of them it'll be like 10 minutes before you play the game
I was expecting more honestly. I'm not sure if this is a game or a god damn movie.
First ones better
Not a good sequel.
I love the first one. This one is impossible. Turn based RTS missions were added and they are impossible. Fix this game it's unplayable.
It's a slightly above boring game. Not worth 10 dollars.

Freaking awesome i liked the first one but this has totally surpassed it by a long ways ... I dont usually give 5 stars but if any game app deserves 5 its definately this one! RECCOMEND DEFINATELY !!!
Absolutely endless cutscenes. There's probably a great game in here (I enjoyed the first one) but an hour of cutscenes with virtually no gameplay is just ridiculous.
Love it just I like always were is the endless mode

Absolutely amazing game, I own the first one on my PS4, and this experience is way more satisfying and addictive than it's predecessor, since it's free with my game pass, I'm gonna buy it on my PS4 so I can play on a big screen and on the go

It's a good game with a good story, but... I just couldn't play Jack. He was so mean and I didn't want to be so mean.... I wish we either had a choice of which character to play as, or some kind of choice in our character's actions. Without those, I had to uninstall.

I am really sorry but the game is overly difficult and has no fun being constantly in Chuck Norris difficulty. It is a pity actually as the first one of the series was way more enjoyable than this sequel. Half of the police squad is drunk or refuse to go on a mission, the professionalism in missions is constantly spiraling up making it impossible to follow cop development, money is draining like crazy... do you expect players to manage to reach the ending?

It's an ok game. I guess I like it. The new combat scenarios are pretty fun, if challenging. The story is long and bunched up very closely at the beginning. Even after just two weeks of in-game time, the missions that you send your officers to are too high level and show up too often for you to be even able to play. The choices for each mission are fun though. Another big problem is officers don't want to do their jobs half the time even if they have "respect" for you, which I think does nothing

A disappointing experience. I played through the first four days, which was enough to be frustrated with my character being demonstrably feckless, useless, and dickish in cinematics, all the while being constantly stymied by what I can only hope is the worst police force in fiction or reality. Every morning a third of my "officers" are begging off work because they ate a pinecone or some other pretext, and then the ones who do show up just straight up refuse to answer codes because they're lazy

What a frustrating experience. How anyone can find this fun is beyond me. A tutorial followed by an hour of cutscenes. Story and dialogue actually put me to sleep. If you're going to make it so story heavy at least make it interesting.
Very bad writing and overly long dialogue that leads to nowhere. Focus on the gameplay! The first once was so much better.
Surprisingly really fun.

Loved the first one, love this one. However, the high star requirements and spamming of calls make the game a lot more difficult as it progresses. More importantly, after Dec 23 and all of the cutscenes that come with it, the game gets stuck on the loading screen with the blue and green lights rather than the next day starting. I cannot advance in the game. EDIT: Changing my review to five stars! I informed the creators of this matter and within two days I am back to playing without problems!

Love it... this game play well on Asus Zenfone max pro M1. I'm willing pay game like this again in the future, and I heard their Dev had released another game named "rebel cops" on PC. Hope it was released on Android too next time.
At the seventh day, carter's jar was literally overflowing with 200+ tabs lmao
Please solve the bugs. I spent 30 mins on a mission and at the end of the day, the map hanged and I cannot end my day. Dont be a disgrace.
replyContent:
Hey there,
and sorry for the trouble. On which day did you experience this problem? Does it happen everytime on that specific day or was it just once? Have you tried to take a different "route" through the day?
Kind regards,
HG-Support

content: Great follow-up to the stellar first game in the series. Introduces new tactical missions (think X-COM) which are a ton of fun. Everything is very well written and voice acted, and the investigations you get the chance to conduct are challenging without being frustrating or unintuitive. My main quibble is that the player doesn't have enough control over the narrative; not many consequential choices can be made. Also sorely lacking is the option to skip a single line of dialogue during cutscenes.
Just like the first game, with some new twists and gameplay mechanics, some crashing issues but decent response time from support team

I love the first game 100%. This game is good, the mechanics are definitely a step up(if you enjoy much more control exp: equipping specific gear. How much professionalism is need for a specific call etc...) what kills this game for me afterwards is how cringy boyd is in the story... the whole story is üöÆ. Also why did you guys take out the: skip line option? I hope if you make a third you guys need to give a option to play story or sandbox.( having to beat the game sucks lol) stil a fan. Fix it

There is waaaaaaay to much story to this and its not even a good one yet. An hour playing and the only game play was a lame tutorial. Definitely not worth $8. I want a refund. You wait a day to inform me I could have gotten a refund had a asked for one within a few hours after buying it...? Gee, yall are a help. Give me my money back!
replyContent:
Hey there,
This is a very story heavy game and it's no secret. But google usually allows for a 2 hours period in which you can test the game and then just refund it by uninstalling. This should be enough to test the game and if you don't like it, which you noticed after an hour, get your money back. 
Kind regards,
HG-Support

content: Around December 10th, the stars required to respond go up from roughly 1,000 to 2,000 this is ridiculous and does not allow me to respond to any calls. 1 Star until devs fix this stupid star requirement problem.

Unacceptable... Paid 7.99 and can't even get pass the first scene ü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è... Fix immediately or give full refund... Damn shame love the first version too..
replyContent:
Hey there,
sadly, your device is rather weak performance wise. Have you tried to lower the graphics settings in the main menu to see if that makes any difference?
Kind regards,

content: Loved the first installment of the game, was looking forwars to this but got bored for the game to start after 40 minutes of cut scenes. Deleted, uninstalled and refunded. Wadte of time üí©

Good game ruined be a boring forced story with cutscenes so so soooo long that are so boring and you can skip them but you have to hold and hold and hold and tap and tap for ages just to get through to the actual good gameplay so you don't have to sit through a boring story.
Hey guys, if you wanted to make an animated film you should have just done that! I just wanted to play a game.
This is a masterpiece of a story, gameplay. A thinking man's action game, role playing without the grind.

An amazing game with issues. a very good sequel with everything that I wished to have on the first one and even more. But...to my opinion 1.the gameplay in the tactical play is too hard and lacks fluency, a bit frustrating and not fun to a point that I stop playing. 2.for some reason few of the officers are doing actions automatically which ruins the whole tactical play. 3.The police officers are way too problematic in their moods and behavior... which limits you way too much. Thank you
Worst game I've ever played. They refused me a refund. Dont fall for it.

This Game Is Good Except You Get Stuck After Half Hour Of Play The Game.The Game will kick you out of the game its self and you have to repkay same mission How Do I get my money back game is not working right

Absolutely beautiful game great buy.......when it runs. Tired of it freezing*only after you progress far enough past returnability* ,fps drops,kicking me out, all the way to changing my home and lock wallpaper. I've optimized my device and still no playability.i was actually going to dev team for some great game ideas but I will not, nor will I be recommending this game to anyone. Until this is fixed or even glanced over my ruling is final.
At the end of every shift games crashes and I'm forced to restart the day

This game has a ton of lag and is impossible to play. Please update to fix this, so far it is a scam for 8 bucks. I followed the things that the support team told me to do, is it possible for me to get a refund.
replyContent: Hey there, and sorry for the trouble. Your device is very weak which probably causes the lag you are talking about. If you haven't already, please try to lower the graphics settings in the main menu and make sure there are no other apps running in the background. If the issue persists, please contact us support@handy-games.com. HG-Support

content: Gameplay of assigning jobs to your team and leading investigations is as good as expected, but there is an issue of difficulty when staff dont turn up to work or straight up quit. You put effort into bolstering your force only to be shafted by poor RNG and unforeseen consequences. The cutscenes could use better writing as there are no likeable characters. Last but not least whats with the xcom knockoff in the game, it doesnt feel fun just a stress fest?

Well I bought the game on the 9th of this month, caught it on sale, and since I like the first one I decided to give it a go! Every time I get to the mission on the 25th day (in the game) and are sending the cops in to apprehend the suspects, the game just suddenly forces close, always! Please fix or contact me if its something on my end and I will change my rating!

I don't know what the game is like because there is too much story which I personally found completely boring and disappointing as I liked the look of the game and its concept. This isn't a game that grips you from the beginning, maybe it would if you played the first one? I tried to play it and got to the point where they find the drugs and deleted the game out of boredom.
I love this game, but I swear the black jack mini game is rigged. I managed to get two 19s in a row and both times the AI got 21. Still really fun though.
Put aside an hour of your life for the longest cut scenes in the world. Just start the game already jeez. If I wanted to watch a film I'd put on Netflix.
replyContent:
Hey there,
the game is very story driven and we know that especially in the beginning it takes a long time to get to actual play, but that's just how the game was designed. But they get shorter and less frequent later in the game, and you can also skip them by longpressing!
Kind regards,
HG-Support

content: Crashes more times than makes sense for such an expensive game. I've played the same day over and over and over again, always losing my progress. I like this game and want to play more but I'm really close to asking for a refund.

Simply amazing. The perfect sequel to one of the best games of this decade ‚Äî kind of what The Godfather Part II was in its time. It takes the foundations of the first game and improves upon every single aspect of them. Great story, graphics, gameplay... What else can I say? Buy it (and the first one) now!
Love the new features! Not as smooth as TITP 1 tho. It's very laggy and feels heavy on the phone. I have a Samsung A9 2018.

The Greatest game ever, great story, great moves and everything is beautifully done. Just needed to be longer and with more cases to solve and more side stories. And maybe a mode could be added which allows you to play continuously with update ability.
Haven't been able to pass Nov 25 due to constant crashes.
The game is great but it keeps turning itself off whenever something new happens, so I have to play the same day several times to make any progress. It is extremely annoying.
Edit : Bugs Are Fix , Finally Still after finish the game there is no endless mode like the original game thus the game has no replayability
It keeps crashing after a few days on my tablet .. Id love to play it though
replyContent:
Hey there,
and sorry for the trouble! Your device is rather weak performance wise, but you can try to reduce the graphics settings in the main menu to see if that helps with the frequent crashes!
Kind regards,
HG-Support

content: I LOVED The First 1. This 1 I Hate. The Story Part Is Annoying, I'm CONSTANTLY Skipping Cuz Its Slow And Takes Away From Actual Gameplay. If I Wantex To Read I Wouldve Grabbed A Book. To Each Their Own. Refunding.
replyContent:
Hey there,
sorry you feel that way, but TITP has always been a very story driven game. And that's why we implemented the "skip" feature which was meant to make this more enjoyable for people who don't like that much story!
Kind regards,
HG-Support

content: What a joke of a response. Nowhere in the descriptions the game does it mention that the game is the complete opposite of reality with cops refusing to go out on calls since they want to play cards.
replyContent:
Hey there,
we know this can be infuriating at times, but it's how the game is supposed to be! You need to find the your loyal cops out of your recruits and keep them by your side to make your life easier!
Kind regards,
HG-Support

content: Only played this game 2 and it was the intro because it didn't save, and I wish I could get a refund because it's not worth all the money I paid for..
replyContent:
Hey there,
the intro is a rather long scene and it takes a while to get to the first save point. Once you reached that checkpoint though , the game saves more frequently!
Kind regards,
HG-Support

content: I really love the first game and just started the second , maybe the best Mobile games out but the lagging on the second games is killing me it catches up if i pause but if there is an update that could change it that would be great . Keep up the good work these games are amazing.
Laggs horrible glitchy have game on xbox 1 love it but on my phone not work a penny let alone 7.99 they are charging

Hey there,
you're phone seems to be rather weak performance wise, maybe you can try to lower the graphics setttings in the main menu to see if that helps?

content: Cool game and a great sequel, works good on my Honor8X, the only problem here is just when you receive messages or a call, when you tab out of the game it resets which kinda annoying.
Great!
Perfect on Galaxy Tab S6. A lot of improvement from the first game. do we have cloud save?
I Still Dont Understand To Play But The GamePlay And Story So Amazing.. I Try To Play Slowly To Understand It..
Its okay but lags badly when your on a opperisions or missions with alot of enemys or friendlys

I loved "This is the police" but this is a damn shame i can't go 5 seconds without the game either crashing or lagging, ik this game is good on pc but damn even most pc ports are better than this smh I feel like it shouldn't be lagging like this on my phone so until the crashing and lagging is completely fixed I'll give this game a 1 Star
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We released several updates that should improve the situation and it looks like you didn't install them. Please try to update and if the problem persists contact our support@handy-games.com. Your device is on the lower edge of supported devices.

content: Brilliant sequel much more to do then the first police game makes you feel more involved and hands on with everything especially like the turn based assaults welldone game devs for bringing this great game to mobile love it well worth a buy.

Needs work. The game is laggy even for the note 9. The audio for the cut screen do not match with the background images and text. The first game is great. If you fix all this then I'll consider rebuying.
Small text and hard to read. If you get a phone call you lose your current progress. So far the story's not that bad.

I'm just going to cut right to the chase here - just like TITP1, the voice acting in this game is not its strong suit. Unfortunately the first, oh, 45 minutes is story with one or two tutorial-style minigames thrown in. It honestly makes opening the app again a difficult choice even though I'm at the actual gameplay section now.
Good story, good way to manage your missions. I find it really hard to get money on the start of december. So frank got arrested. Game over. :(

A really cool game that continues the story of Jack Boyd and implements all kinds of new features like being able to control deputies in turn-based tactical missions, a new setting, new characters, an all-new progression system for your deputies with skills that change how they respond to callouts and a ton more,... Would recommend.
Most bugs seem to be fixed I really enjoy the game but it should only be played on a tablet a normal phone is too small, also if you get stuck you will need to lookup walkthroughs
Still doesnt work frame rate is crazy slow.....may i have my refund.
replyContent: We are sorry to hear that. Please contact our support@handy-games.com for that matter. Thanks.

content: Fix this game..when i m want play my screen blank
replyContent: Hi there, please try to re-install and restart your device. We are currently investigating this issue, but some users report after re-installing it worked.

content: I really wanted to play this since I truly enjoyed the first one but apparently this game is only for people with perfect vision. The text is so small with no option to enlarge. I couldn't even get past the first case without serious eye strain.

Great game, entertaining story. 2 things that could be improved: the size of the user interface (its difficult to hit some of the decisions on smartphones) and the checkpoints being the only option to save your progress (a normal day can take up to 15 minutes to play, then suddenly a tactical mission appears and you have to play up to another 20 minutes to not lose your progress)

I remember buying this on Steam then never getting the chance to play it. Now that I can play it on my phone, I've enjoyed every minute of it. The story telling is great, but somethings may be a bit hard to understand if you never played the first game. Pick it up!
Great game but very infuriating when you cant do anything since you dont have police and you get arrested.
No crashes, missing text fixed, great game Using: Galaxy S10
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We are working on a fix for the missing texts! Kind regards,

content: Game wont open this if frustrating
replyContent: Hi there, please try to re-install and restart your device. We are currently investigating this issue, but some users report after re-installing it worked.

content: i got the blank screen and stuck after handy games loading, and i try to delete my cache and data, also restart my phone, but this is a same things, not working on my samsung galaxy A7, please fix this develop, and i gift you 5 star, thanks.
replyContent: Hi there and sorry for your trouble. We are currently working on a fix for the starting issues that some users reported. Thank you for your patience.

content: Loving the game so far! I'm really picky when it comes to games, but the moment I watched the first few cutscenes I knew this game would keep me entertained! It's amazing how you tell the story using that animation style. It feels like watching a movie. Thanks for a great game so far. On a side note... If I leave the game while playing those missions where you control your team, on my return the progress is lost and I need to go through the whole day again. Those missions can take a while!
Great game realistic simulation, there is a note the size of the writing line is too small and difficult to read the text, I hope that is fixed... Thanks
Game crashes and runs extremely slow(update) after new update game just goes to black screen
replyContent: Hi there and sorry for your trouble! Did you try to restart your device or if nothing helps reinstall the game? It should work on your device. Thanks!

content: Works great and looks great on Galaxy S10+ Love this game so far and the 1st one also. Excited to get farther into it. Glad to see a good quality game on the app store. They're getting few and far between. Thanks.
PLEASE GIVE ME A REFUND SUCKS

Game kept stopping. I am on 26th November and I am not able to start the tactical mission because everytime i start the mission, game stops. I have already played the 26th November 3 times but still havent been able to complete the day. Dont know what to do. Please rectify this.
replyContent: Hi, did you try after the 1.09 update? Your device is on the lower edge of supported devices but it should work after the update. Thanks.

content: Gameplay is incredibly slow. Lots of reading extremely long storylines which definitely require complete attention. Not a game you can play casually. (Edit - now to top it off they refused my refund even though I played the game for less than 20 minutes - so I payed $8 for a horrible game I don't want).

I love this game and I have loved it ever since it came out on PC so I am super happy I can get to play it on my phone. I have recommended it to all my friends xD. Just one small issue, sometimes the writing is too small and also during missions it would be great if we could zoom in and out on the action. Overall great game, thank you.

Initially had black screen on load, was fixed after clearing storage and redownloading assets through the game and not the play store. At first blush the game doesn't seem to be optimized for people with big fingers. I miss-press all the time when moving people. I also played this on pc, as well as the original. Please, I'm begging you, add a survival mode of some type with progression. This would be a fantastic sim but I keep getting bogged in story.
The game always crashes i think too many bugs...please fix the game
replyContent: Hi there and sorry for your trouble. We are currently working on a patch to fix crash issues on weaker devices. Thank you for your patience.

content: I guess this wasnt made for phones
Waste of my money
replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy the game. If however you have technical issues that prevent you from playing please contact our support: support@handy-games.com  so we can help you! :)

content: Yeah... game starts but just shows the logo of the company that made the game then it's a black screen for as long as I have the game open. I left it open for 30 mins to see if it was just loading but the game never worked.

content: Playing on an Samsung S9, crashed constantly and then reaching the main game, the game wouldnt let me assign officers to a case, so refunded
